item.description:
Bob Grundy our instructor!!! he is very dedicated to this group and has been an inspiration to many new comers who want to come back, its a fun night out.

 

 

A BIG welcome to all the new dancers from Meetup.com. Along with all the others who showed up with their two left feet. It was so much fun seeing so many "variations" being done on the dance floor. Still time to join us at our 2012 Summer Session for Line Dance Beginners; for someone who has two left feet when it comes to insrtuctional this instructor taught me wrong!!! There are no errors we call them VARIATIONS,lol,,Wear comfy dance shoes, and just bring a smile ;-) You will not be sorry!!!

 

Dress in comfortable light clothes and wear shoes that don't stick to floor ( but not slippery either).

Bring bottled water, to stay hydrated in between sets, because you will work up a sweat.

You are in for alot of fun while learning dance steps that are very popular in todays single world, this is a mixed gender class.

The room has lots of fans.

http://www.billybobs-line-couples-dancing.com/

 www.TheCladdaghPub.com

 

Time -7-9pm

Cost- 8.00

 

This is a 10 week class started 6/11/12 you only missed 2 sessions, no problem we go over the basic steps every week and add new ones on.
item.how_to_find_us: We are on the second floor this repeats weekly
item.name: Demonstrate and Introduce Line Dancing to Anyone Interested in Learning
